main event: A bright white light was tracked on radar moving rapidly at high altitudes near Choshi, Japan.
interesting points: The light ascended rapidly to approximately 50,000 feet at an estimated speed of 3000 to 4000 knots., Control tower personnel confirmed the presence of the light., The light made a 90-degree turn to the west and then descended to about 40,000 feet where it remained stationary for several minutes., Radar operators, highly experienced, tracked the light covering a distance of about 200 miles in approximately 2 to 3 minutes., The sighting was categorized as incredible and attributed to a possible reconnaissance vehicle of extraterrestrial origin.
witness description: Flight controller at Air Defense Control Center and control tower personnel
